mapper.update:

JCSJ_RECORD_TIME = #{jcsjRecordTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
JCSJ_EXTRACT_TIME = #{jcsjExtractTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
JCSJ_NO = #{jcsjNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},
JCSJ_CONTROL_CHART_ID = #{jcsjControlChartId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
JCSJ_DATA_POINT_HIERARCHICA_DATA = #{jcsjDataPointHierarchicaData,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JCSJ_DATA_SAMPLE = #{jcsjDataSample,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JCSJ_STATE = #{jcsjState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
JCSJ_CONTROL_CHART_DATA = #{jcsjControlChartData,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JCSJ_USER_ID = #{jcsjUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

where JCSJ_ID = #{jcsjId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select JCSJ_ID from detection_data where JCSJ_CONTROL_CHART_ID = #{jcsjControlChartId,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by JCSJ_ID
limit #{offset,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{limit,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select
